entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0047 should not appear in pattern-match expression when-clause of switch-case. #75203
  • IDE0045 Bad suggestion results in CS8602 false-positive, revert results in bad IDE0045 suggestion #75200
  • WarningsAsErrors is not working #75198
  • Improved async method builders #75196
    Backlog
  • Unexpected value `QueryClause` of type `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundKind` #75194
    17.12

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35320.61 #75190

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • VisitCollectionBuilderCollectionExpression - Ensure target of a spread element is rewritten. #75201
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Use SegmentHeap by default in app.manifest #75199
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2543568 #75195
    auto-merge
  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Test EnC document diagnostics in non-host workspace #75140
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Include workspace kind in error message for easier diagnostics #75137
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add more better conversions tests #75188
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75189
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix reporting of MSBuild warnings in MSBuildWorkspace #75183
    Area-IDE, Community, IDE-MSBuildWorkspace, untriaged
